segments.text: We have a holiday next week , don't we ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm probably going to spend the day looking at cars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At cars ! You aren't thinking about buying a car , are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . I'd like to be able to get around a little more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it will be expensive to have a car in the city , won't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I don't know.Of course , gasoline costs a lot these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what about parking ? You can't park on the street , can you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A lot of people do . I'll try it for a while anyway , but I certainly don't want to pay a lot of parking tickets .
segments.speaker: S2
